pkgmetadata.longdescription: A Collection of Outlier Ensemble Algorithms // Ensemble functions for outlier/anomaly detection. There is a new ensemble method proposed using Item Response Theory. Existing outlier ensemble methods from Schubert et al (2012) doi:10.1137/1.9781611972825.90, Chiang et al (2017) doi:10.1016/j.jal.2016.12.002 and Aggarwal and Sathe (2015) doi:10.1145/2830544.2830549 are also included.
